title: Average Time Spent On Social Media Daily in Maputo by Age Group
summary: The chart shows the Minutes of at the Average Time Spent On Social Media Daily street .
\\n The highest Minutes was 181 in the 45-54 Age followed by 157 % in the 25-34 Age , 181 % in 45-54 and finally 73 % in 55-64 .
gold: This chart expresses the average time spent on social media per day by age group for the population of Maputo . \\n \\n Here we can see that younger age group ( 15 - 24 year olds ) spend a significantly larger proportion of their time on social media that their elders , with an even decline from 180 minutes per day at 15 - 24 to 70 minute per day at 55 - 64 .
